articles.title: Julius Onah to direct Captain America 4 - The Verge
articles.description: Marvel’s fourth Captain America movie will be directed by The Cloverfield Paradox’s Julius Onah and see Anthony Mackie return as Sam Wilson, Captain America.
articles.content:
The movie will see Anthony Mackie return as Sam Wilson, the new Captain America
Anthony Mackie as Sam Wilson in The Falcon and the Winter Soldier

articles.author: Luke Andrews
articles.title: Dozens of people line up for monkeypox vaccine in NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: Gay or bisexual men who have multiple sexual partners over two weeks are again being offered the jab in America's monkeypox capital, alongside anyone exposed to the disease.
articles.content:
Dozens of people lined up for vaccines against monkeypox in New York City Friday as the city launched its second jabbing drive.
